item.description: Core Competencies Analytical Thinker Focused on gaining interpretable insights from data. Experienced in working with large datasets and using advanced data analysis to answer complex questions with accuracy, applying sophisticated tools and techniques. Proficient in mastering new knowledge and techniques quickly. Able to understand and articulate what questions can and canâ€™t be answered given certain data. Model Building Experienced in using statistical techniques and modeling with real-world, messy data. Able to apply sophisticated mathematics to understanding data.
